projects.name: Splatter Bug
projects.purpose: Create a full stack bug tracking application.
projects.description: Splatter Bug offers a full service to managers and team members. Managers control teams where developers can easily record their bugs and errors. Splatter bug's front end is build with React, and it connects to my Node API that works with my MongoDB database.

projects.name: the daily poll
projects.purpose: Develop a simple poll answering game.
projects.description: It's a simple website where you can answer a new poll daily and see what other users voted. The front end is React and it connects to a Firebase database on clientside.

projects.name: personal website
projects.purpose: Professionaly display my projects, passions, and fun.
projects.description: It's a simple website where you can answer a new poll.

projects.name: Spotify Music Mapping
projects.purpose: Create a fun project, creating a project that I wanted to share.
projects.description: It's basically a website that does everyhting on the front end. It's gonna like take your music and cobine it with your friends music and then you can see cool shit.
